summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-powered career recommendation website for Indian students. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend is 90% working with one significant issue in recommendations generation.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 422 error when generating recommendations from frontend
minor_issues.impact: Users cannot get AI career recommendations through UI
minor_issues.details: Backend API works in direct testing but fails when called from frontend form submission

ui_bugs.issue: Current Class dropdown has interaction issues when High School is selected
ui_bugs.details: Dropdown appears but options are not easily selectable

integration_issues.issue: 422 error when submitting assessment for AI analysis
integration_issues.details: Frontend form data may not match backend validation requirements

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all sections (hero, features, testimonials)
Dashboard navigation between Assessment, Recommendations, AI Counselor tabs
Assessment form - Academic Level and Stream selection
Assessment form - Interests and Strengths checkboxes
AI Chat interface with GPT-4o integration
Chat message sending and receiving AI responses
action_item_for_E1: Fix the 422 error in recommendations generation - investigate data validation between frontend form submission and backend /api/assessment/analyze endpoint. The backend API works in direct testing but fails when called from the frontend form.
